Various mentoring programs to increase competences:

  • Internal mentoring programs at TF1: Possibility of having a mentor from a department other than one's own.
  • Inter-group mentoring programs: Possibility of having a mentor from another entity (Bouygues Ã‰nergie Services, Bouygues Construction, etc.) belonging to the TF1 group.
  • "External" mentoring program: Possibility of having a mentor (in a higher hierarchical position and/or with more experience) from another company (Coca-Cola, Microsoft, etc.) to improve soft skills.

"Leadership for women" training offered to female employees, depending on their profiles, in all sectors (Tech professions, support functions, etc.). Duration: 3 to 4 days.

Inclusive onboarding

  • Assignment of a buddy
  • Welcome morning
  • Visit of the premises, the showroom and the innovation side
  • Exchange with HR
  • Interventions by COMEX members (strategy, upcoming deadlines, etc.)

EQUAL PAY

  • Salary amounts re-challenged annually with some focus on female profiles (managers and non-managers) in order to have income equity and reduce the gap that may exist between men and women
  • Talent development matrix within TF1 - in a fairly transient way, with some attention paid to gender mix, diversity and inclusion

WORK LIFE BALANCE

  • Remote work agreement which applies to all employees on permanent contracts and after an adaptation period, with 2 days of TT (maximum) and 3 days on site (minimum).
  • Flexible working hours
  • A range of measures (schedule adjustments, days off work, etc.) to make life easier for employees who are caregivers
  • Parenthood:
    • Arrangement of working hours after the declaration of pregnancy (full remote option, reduction of working hours to 80% paid 100%)
    • Birth bonus
    • 4 weeks breastfeeding leave
    • Second parent leave of 1 month
    • 16 weeks adoption leave (preparation of the child's reception)
    • Sick child leave
  • Mental health :
    • Questionnaire sent annually to employees
    • On-site doctor
    • Insurance company offering consultations with different types of health professionals
    • Foot reflexology, naturopathy and alternative medicine sessions available upon registration
    • Self-defense courses (krav-maga, etc.)

DE&I ACTIONS

  • 50/50 Board for gender diversity composed of both men and women leading numerous actions in favor of diversity, equity and inclusion, in the context of meetings between employees
    • Inspirational conferences with women from different professions (Air Force, etc.)
    • Film screenings
    • Round tables
    • Informal networking cocktails
    • Inter-company events (Coca, Microsoft)
    • Stand-ups
  • One of the first media in France to have signed the charter of inclusion and non-discrimination based on sexual orientation (The Other Circle's LGBT Charter of Commitment)
  • Committed to the #StOpE initiative (At Work Against Ordinary Sexism in the Workplace)
  • Signatory of the "Inclusion Manifesto" in favor of the employment of people with disabilities Signatory of the Charter for Corporate Parenthood
  • A part of the DE&I budget is dedicated to the disability mission:
    • A member of staff works to ensure that all disabled employees who join TF1 can flourish: facilitating their arrival (adjusting workstations), career development, support.
    • Implementation of actions, participation in cafÃ©s organized by associations to recruit future employees with disabilities, sponsorship, etc.
weLike: Thanks to all the actions implemented in favor of diversity, equity and inclusion, this major content player in France scored high in each of the subcategories of our #GenderScore: 90 for equal pay, 89 in terms of equitable career development, 86 for work-life balance and finally 88 in terms of concrete measures for ED&I. With 40% of women in c-level positions and 28.5% of women in Tech roles, TF1 is actively working to create the conditions for an inclusive work environment to increase the number of female profiles in its Tech workforce.
mission:
Being a major player in content is a unique opportunity, and a great responsibility. Because nothing is more important than content.

Content can stimulate one person, ten people or millions of people. It can reveal what is faraway and what is close by. It can change our attitude to others, our world view, and sometimes even the direction of history.

Through all the content that we conceive and produce, we want to positively inspire society.

Positively inspiring society means enriching peopleâ€™s lives by enabling them to experience positive emotions. By telling people about the world and how it is changing. But also by showcasing French and European creativity, and supporting all businesses, large and small.
recruitment:
Once you have identified the offer that attracts you and meets your expectations: apply!

We will acknowledge receipt of your application and inform you by e-mail.

Our Talent Acquisition team will carefully review your application. Two possibilities:

  • Our recruitment team contacts you for an initial telephone conversation to share your initial motivation.
  • You will receive an email indicating that your application has not been retained for this time.

If your application has been selected, we will offer you an interview at our offices.

You will meet the recruiter, the operational manager(s) and the human resources manager. Technical and personality tests may be scheduled.

Whatever the outcome of the interviews, our recruiter will keep you informed of the progress of the process.

name: Finary
diversityActions:
Fair Career Path

  • Bi-annual performance reviews
  • Anyone who wants more responsibility can get it â€“ along with coaching and adjusted contracts
  • When the position is adjusted, the salary is also adjusted
  • Every employee has the same opportunities at Finary, as soon as there is a new goal, the company walks this path together

Equal Pay

  • Equal pay is common sense at Finary
  • The company has a salary grid that everyone knows about
  • Salaries can be above the grid if justified and agreed on by the team
  • Two salary plans: 1: more equity and less salary or 2: less equity and more salary
  • A mixture of both payment plans is possible as well
  • Bi-annual salary package reviews to ensure that all packages in the team are coherent
  • Bi-annual salary review process to check on objectives and if a salary raise is justified

Work-life balance

  • Flexible and remote policy: work from anywhere as long as the job is done
  • Vacation can always be taken if one is considerate with colleagues
  • Workplace wellness services with food, drinks and healthy things at the office
  • Very flexible policies when it comes to traveling or work in other cities with other people
  • Fun times with off-work hours for employees to bond and get to know each other

DEI actions

  • Appointed and coached individual that works on DE&I within the company
  • Finary believes that DE&I is about maintaining a DE&I spirit and state of mind
  • Finary has maternity and paternity leave
  • New parents get the possibility of very flexible ways of working, which Finary feels is â€œonly about organization and communicationâ€

Diversity and inclusion ambitions for the next year

In the next year, Finary wants to be above 30% of women in the company.
weLike: Finary's app allows investors to centralize their assets. This provides an organized overview of asset allocations, especially if investors hold investments in many different asset classes. The company believes that people work better if theyâ€™re trusted, respected and empowered in their work. Therefore, an atmosphere of absolute trust and security is important to the team. With a powerful team of 15 employees all over Europe, Finary is dedicated to remote work and all the benefits that come with it â€“ for example, a great flexibility of working hours. This flexibility also applies to maternity and paternity leave. As soon as parents want to take leave or work hours that fit even better, ways are found to do so. We simply love this mindset! With an equal pay score of 92 and 75 for DE&I actions, you can expect a salary that is fair for everyone, and a company culture where there is always someone to talk to. If you want to grow, the company will go this way with you and of course your salary will be adjusted, too. Like what you read? Then Finary is ready for you!
benefits:
• Competitive Salary
  • Meaningful equity grant
  • Top-notch health insurance
  • Flexible Work - you choose where you work - from your home, the beach, the Finary HQ, or a nice coworking space
  • Flexible Paid Time Off
  • New MacBook Pro, and all the gear you need
  • Quarterly company retreats
  • English or French lessons
mission:
At Finary, we believe that the way people invest will change dramatically in the coming years. A new generation of investors is transforming the codes of an opaque and austere financial world. They have realised that they must take control of their finances and implement an investment strategy.

Before Finary, our users were using excel spreadsheets to track their investments! However, asset tracking is the foundation of sound and optimised management. The Finary application, unique in the world, meets their need for centralisation, simplicity and transparency. It replaces a dozen different applications!

Finary's strength is to be able to value all assets in real time and automatically. We allow investors to save time and focus on the essential: reaching their goals. In addition to our technology, we provide our users with powerful Insights that allow them to get rid of hidden fees on their investments. This unique feature saves each user an average of â‚¬68,667 in fees over the next 30 years

values:
LEADERSHIP - Own your scope.

We own our scope and are responsible. Frugality, doing more with less is also part of this mindset. This enables us to work on achieving more together, relying on each other.

SPEED - Fast-paced, detail oriented.

We have a bias for action. Speed matters in business. Many decisions and actions are reversible and do not need extensive study. We value calculated risk taking.

DELIGHT - Customer Obsession.

Our community and our product are what make us us. Attention to detail is key to our success. We balance innovation with scrupulous attention to every user, pixel and bit that make Finary.

A-TEAM - Grow the best team.

The best people want to work among the best and strive in motivating environments. Thatâ€™s why we only hire top players and give everyone the tools to become the best version of themselves.

OVERACHIEVE - Raise the bar higher.

Creating a leader in the finance world can only be done with the absolute best product and technology. We have relentlessly high standards, continually raising the bar.

HEALTHY - Respect, diversity and inclusivity

We strongly believe that having a wide variety of experiences and backgrounds is key to our success. And that people work better if theyâ€™re trusted, respected and empowered in their work.

quote: "At Finary, we want to hire women in all positions. We want them to be an important part of the conversation in the product we are creating. We want them to feel heard, so we can shape an inclusive dynamic in everything we do.â€ Julien Blancher, CTO of Finary

mission:
The retail industry has seen profound changes in consumption habits in the last few years. Expectations regarding service level and transparency have never been higher.

We built Bigblue to give brands everything they need to meet customer expectations. We enable merchants to deliver the most advanced purchasing experience while remaining loyal to their environmental commitment. To find out more, read our manifesto here. 

How?

Our customer-obsessed culture permeates everything we do.We provide the most advanced purchase and post-purchase experience in the market that allows brands to delight their clients through:

  • Advanced technologies that power an enterprise-grade logistics network and the best customer experience imaginable to scale brands globally, and without friction.
  • Deep integrations with the main sales channels, warehouses, carriers, and tools to boost our clientâ€™s growth.
  • The first e-commerce founders network in Europe and partnered with experts from the most used digital platforms and tools in retail.

weLike:
With almost 100 employees Bigblue has developed a highly intuitive warehouse network and delivery system that allows brands to scale their operations with ease. Part of this is ultra fast fulfillment and extremely good shipping prices.

But that's not the only reason we love Bigblue. Because it's one thing what the customer gets - but another what the employees get. And here, Bigblue is not only on an extremely good path, but already implementing many things that ensure fairness between the genders â€“ such as a transparent salary grid, maternity/paternity leave and a very open culture when it comes to diverse profiles.

Everything that is done for the employees is done for the whole company. This mindset is a priority in the company's goals, and it comes directly from the founders, which benefits the entire company.

Go Bigblue! We love you!
diversityActions:
Fair Career Path

  • Bigblue always needs experienced employees but also works with many junior employees
  • Very open to diverse professional work experience
  • Processes allow people to show their skills and work with them
  • Employees only have to want to learn and progress to get all the chances
  • Career change candidates are always very welcome
  • Onboarding, breakfasts and meetings with the whole team for employees coming back from maternity/paternity leave
  • Buddy system in place to integrate and onboard employees
  • Bigblue tries to promote employees in the company before someone is hired from outside
  • Teams are prepared to take opportunities

Equal Pay

  • Transparent salary grid
  • The grid is based on experience and the level of impact
  • Men and women are equally paid
  • Salaries are improved due to crisis and inflation
  • Constant work on the salary grid
  • Good package of stock options to improve every employeeâ€™s entrepreneurial mindset
  • Tool, that allows all Bigbluers to get an idea of how much they can earn with stock options
  • Everyone gets an annual salary review â€“ re-evaluations are possible, if the level of experience has been underestimated

Work-Life Balance

  • Around 70 per cent of the employees can work fully remote â€“ depending on the position
  • And everyone is on a hybrid and flexible model
  • Employees can organize themselves remotely as they want
  • Working late is possible as well when discussed with managers
  • Holidays are never refused without a good reason to do so

DEI

  • Bigblue cares deeply about diverse profiles
  • Everything is done for every employee equally, no matter the gender
  • Parents are encouraged to take maternity and paternity leave (legal amount)
  • Salary increases take place â€“ maternity leave isnâ€™t seen as a standby in the career
  • Bigblue believes, that in maternity and paternity leave employees can learn things like organization, management and problem-solving that can help the company
  • Diversity and inclusion is on the list of objective key results
  • Partnerships with companies such as 50inTech to support DE&I actions
  • Webinars about DE&I

Here are our diversity and inclusion ambitions for the next year:

  • Dedicated budget and resources for DE&I actions
  • Trainings with experts for every employee and manager
  • Set targets to achieve gender parity in tech roles (50 per cent)
  • Precisely monitor DE&I metrics
  • Surveys that are done internally

name: Recycleye
diversityActions:
Fair Career Path

  • Recycleye keeps track of their turnover rate â€“ for every leaving employee, there is an exit interview to find out issues and improve them
  • Career grid available for the whole company to allow conversations around performance and progression
  • Progression framework is broken down into clear competency matrixes with different levels
  • Bi-annual reviews to talk about goals and plans in order to help employees grow in the way they want to
  • Buddy assigned for every new employee

Equal Pay

  • Equal pay for men and women
  • Recycleye researches common salaries very thoroughly and pays accordingly
  • Annual salary review in place â€“ salaries are discussed based on different factors and can be increased
  • Salary increase after parental leave is possible if there has been a salary review
  • Employees can choose between two salary options: higher salary and lower equity or lower salary and higher equity

Work-life balance

  • Unlimited holidays â€“ managers encourage employees to take days off
  • Flexible work schedule: Employees can start and leave an hour earlier or later
  • Work times out of the ordinary are possible if managers agree
  • Remote work for 90 % of the team (some employees need to work on-site with the robot)
  • Usually, employees are in the office two Tuesdays a month â€“ exceptions and moderations are possible

DEI actions

  • Recycleye is proud to support parental leave
  • Employees in the company for more than two years can choose between eight weeks of full paid time off â€“ 16 weeks half pay or the midterms amount
  • Zero tolerance policy on harassment â€“ cases are investigated and contracts ended immediately
  • Anti-discrimination policy available for everyone
  • Frequent anonymous surveys about DE&I and the happiness of employees
weLike: London-based Recycleye is using advanced machine learning, computer vision and automation to revolutionize waste sorting. Recycleye Vision and Robotics increase waste sorting performance, enable data-driven strategic decision making and support transparency, traceability and efficiency. Recycleye is not only extremely progressive in its technology, but also in terms of its corporate culture. Among many other benefits, employees can look forward to unlimited annual leave, remote working and enhanced parental leave for both parents. All of this is backed by a zero-tolerance policy towards harassment. Absolutely outstanding!
